User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user account within the eStores WorkHub portal.

role.description: The user's role within the system (e.g., Employee, Admin, College, Industry).

/employees/{employeeId}.description: Stores employee user data. The document ID is the user's auth UID.

/admins/{adminId}.description: Stores administrator user data. The document ID is the user's auth UID.

/colleges/{collegeId}.description: Stores college user data. The document ID is the user's auth UID.

/industries/{industryId}.description: Stores industry user data. The document ID is the user's auth UID.
